p: Overall, there are no certain antiviral medications or vaccines for SARS-CoV-2, options based on the background of managing SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV, or novel influenza virus. In addition to the previously mentioned regimes, ShuFengJieDu, and Lianhuaqingwen the Chinese medication, Remdesivir, and Oral oseltamivir offer the best potential choices. However, the efficiency and safety still need to be verified by clinical experiments; importantly, for SARS-CoV-2, according to the guidelines, IFN- alpha and LPV/r are recommended as antiviral therapy [75].
